ch0016_41_huuro/0101_0701_02_10:
Today is a special day, so how about you and I
have some fun?
ch0016_41_huuro/7101_0701_01_10:
Isn’t this fancy outfit perfect for
the occasion?
ch0016_41_huuro/7101_0701_02_10:
I’ve been trying to mimic Elesa’s modeling moves
to show it off!
ch0016_41_huuro/7102_0701_01_10:
Tornadus can fly through the sky at 200 miles
per hour.
ch0016_41_huuro/7102_0701_02_10:
He flies right past the clouds and on to
new horizons.
ch0016_41_huuro/7102_0701_03_10:
It’s so exhilarating! You should come flying with
us sometime!
ch0016_41_huuro/7103_0701_01_10:
I’m always improving my piloting skills so I can
take people anywhere they want!
ch0016_41_huuro/7103_0701_02_10: Even on a stormy day, you can count on me!
ch0016_41_huuro/7103_0701_03_10: Tornadus and I will get you where you’re going!
ch0016_41_huuro/7104_0701_01_10: As a pilot, you have to have great eyesight!
ch0016_41_huuro/7104_0701_02_10: If you ever get lost, give me a call.
ch0016_41_huuro/7104_0701_03_10:
I’ll get you to your destination in just a hop, skip,
and a jump!
ch0016_41_huuro/7105_0701_02_10:
Elesa was gonna help me pick out an outfit.
Wanna come?
ch0016_41_huuro/7105_0701_03_10: We could also get some fashion tips from her, too!
ch0016_41_huuro/1701_0701_01_10: I found something neat the other day while flying.
ch0016_41_huuro/1701_0701_02_10: I’d like you to have it!
ch0016_41_huuro/1701_0702_01_10:
I’m sure I’ll find something again soon, so look
forward to it!
ch0016_41_huuro/2501_0701_01_10:
Tornadus is powerful enough to blow
houses away.
ch0016_41_huuro/2501_0701_02_10:
As a Trainer, I’ve been thinking about how to best
wield his power.
ch0016_41_huuro/2501_0702_01_10: I want Tornadus to stay as free as the sky.
ch0016_41_huuro/2501_0702_02_10:
So instead of restricting his power, I want to fly
alongside him.
ch0016_41_huuro/2511_0701_01_10:
Phew! This dress is gorgeous, but it sure draws a
lot of attention...
ch0016_41_huuro/2511_0701_02_10:
Elesa’s always conscious of her job as a model
when she battles. She always looks fierce!
ch0016_41_huuro/2511_0701_03_10: I think I’m starting to understand her true genius.
ch0016_41_huuro/2511_0702_01_10: How do I get over this nervousness?
ch0016_41_huuro/2511_0702_02_10:
Since you’re always joining events and
tournaments, you must get lots of attention,
don’t you.
ch0016_41_huuro/3001_0701_01_10:
One day, I’ll show you how breathtaking it is to
see a sunrise from the sky!
ch0016_41_huuro/3003_0701_01_10:
Hi there! Wanna join me for some training? Just
make sure you have everything you need!
ch0016_41_huuro/3005_0701_01_10:
Phew, I’m beat. I need a break after all that
flying I did today! How about you?
